thread.title: Did Guddu Ki Gun because of Soha Ali Khan: Kunal Khemu
thread.title_full: Did Guddu Ki Gun because of Soha Ali Khan: Kunal Khemu

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Did Guddu Ki Gun because of Soha Ali Khan: Kunal Khemu
text:
Did Guddu Ki Gun because of Soha Ali Khan: Kunal Khemu By Indo-Asian News Service on October 13, 2015 at 6:26 PM Comments Mumbai, Oct 13: Actor Kunal Kemmu, who is waiting for the release of his upcoming adult comedy “Guddu Ki Gun”, says he agreed to do this film only after his wife Soha Ali Khan insisted. ”I remember, when the directors of the film met me and discussed the idea, I just heard one line and said, ‘no I am not doing it. Please leave’,” said Kunal at a promotional event of the film here. (Read: Bigg Boss contestant Pooja Misrra slaps people in a departmental store (Watch video!)) “But, when Soha read the script she said after ‘Go Goa Gone’, this is the comedy I should do because it is hilarious and it has very intelligently written script,” he added. Directed by Shantanu Ray Chhibber and Sheershak Anand, the film also features Payel Sarkar and Aparna Sharma. The film will clash at the box office with Kunal’s wife Soha Ali Khan and Vir Das starrer “31st October”. Both the films are slated to release on October 30. 
Modified Date: October 13, 2015 6:26 PM Topics:
